definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">world_ticks</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="world_data_isremote"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="56" w="334">This will run only if the player sleeps or the time reaches 1 tick after the new day starts.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MOD</field><value name="A"><block type="world_data_current_time"></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">24000</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_from_text"><comment pinned="false" h="54" w="370">This will randomize the update tick between first tick and one second after 6:00 AM in-game.</comment><value name="NUMTEXT"><block type="text_format_number"><value name="number"><block type="math_random_int_between"><value name="min"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">20</field></block></value></block></value><value name="format"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">##</field></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><comment pinned="false" h="55" w="435">This will then check if the season day is about to change to the next season. If not then it will simply increase the day.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GTE</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:worldSeasonDay</field></block></value><value name="B"><block has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:worldSeasonName</field><comment pinned="false" h="36" w="227">This will set the next season.</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="text"><field
